column2: EPR Properties operates as a real estate investment trust. The company is headquartered in Kansas City, Missouri and currently employs 64 full-time employees. The firm is focused on experiential properties in the real estate industry. The company is focused on various property types, including theatres, eat and play, ski, attractions, experiential lodging, gaming, fitness and wellness, cultural and live venues. Its portfolio includes approximately 183 megaplex theaters, 12 family entertainment centers, seven entertainment retail centers, 36 golf entertainment complexes, 12 ski areas, 20 attractions and 15 other recreation facilities. Its portfolio also includes approximately 16 private schools and 72 early childhood education centers. The company operates properties across approximately 416 locations.
